semknox-search.messageNotBlank: This value should not be blank.

lastPing.title: Time of last cronjob-ping
lastPing.warning: The last cronjob ran more than 200seconds ago. Please setup the job at least one time every 2 min, better every 1min.!
lastPing.error: The cronjob has never been started. Please refer to your sys-admin!
lastPing.success: The last cronjob ran less than 200seconds ago.

currentUpdateRunning.title: Time of current running cronjob
currentUpdateRunning.warning: The current update takes less than 2hours.
currentUpdateRunning.error: The current update takes more than 2hours!
currentUpdateRunning.success: The current update takes less than 20minutes.

lastUpdate.title: Time of last completed cronjob
lastUpdate.warning: The last update took less than 2hours.
lastUpdate.error: The last update took more than 2hours!
lastUpdate.success: The last update took less than 20minutes.

info.title: Reset cronjob
info.text:
The reset-command was sent to the server.
As far as the cronjob is running, the new data will be transfered to the SiteSearch360-server.

error.title: Reset cronjob
error.text: There was an error sending the reset-command!

configInfo.title: How to configure
configInfo.text:
To start the upload to the SiteSearch360-Server, you have to create a cronjob in your system-config.
Please ask your administrator!
Following you will find an example for the entry in your crontab:
configInfo.text3:
Please adjust the paths (higlighted) according your shopware-installation.
With this configuration the cronjob will be started once per minute, which is necessary for uploading several datablocks.

credentials.onBoardingText: You don't hava any credentials for Site Search 360 yet? Register here:

target.label: SiteSearch360-target
target.tooltipText: Choose between the SiteSearch360-targets stage and production.

customerId.label: Project-ID
customerId.tooltipText: The REST API project ID is used to authenticate this plugin with the SiteSearch360-API.

apiKey.label: Api Key
apiKey.tooltipText: The REST API api key is used to authenticate this plugin with the SiteSearch360-API.

enableSearch.label: Activate SiteSearch360
enableSearch.tooltipText: Activate this option to use the SiteSearch360 in the frontend.

enableUpdate.label: Activate SiteSearch360-update
enableUpdate.tooltipText: Activate this option to start uploading data to the SiteSearch360-API

enableAutosuggest.label: Activate SiteSearch360-Autosuggest in Frontend
enableAutosuggest.tooltipText: Activate this option to use the SiteSearch360-Autosuggesttool, not the Shopware-flyout

updateBlocksize.label: Count of products per update-datablock
updateBlocksize.tooltipText: The number of products per datablock in the update-procedure.

updateVariantMaster.label: send master-product of variants to search
updateVariantMaster.tooltipText: if you want to be able to list master-products of variants in your listing, set this to true.

updateUploadContent.label: upload content data to SiteSearch360
updateUploadContent.tooltipText: If you want to upload the content data via the plugin upload-procedure, set this to true.

redirectOn1.label: automatic redirect to product page
redirectOn1.tooltipText: If you want an automatic redirection to the product page of a single search result, set this to true.

changemediadomain.label: change media-domain to shop-domain
changemediadomain.tooltipText: If you want to change the domain of an automatic generated URL of an media to the shop-domain, set this to true.

semknoxActivateCategoryListing.label: use SiteSearch360-data for category-listings
semknoxActivateCategoryListing.tooltipText: if you want to use the SiteSearch360-data in your category-listings, set this to true

semknoxActivateSearchTemplate.label: use SiteSearch360-template search-listing-output
semknoxActivateSearchTemplate.tooltipText: if you want to activate the SiteSearch360-template on search-listing-output, set this to true

button.title: Get API-credentials
button.tooltipText: Get new credentials for this subshop

cronTime.label: Cronjob starttime (hour, UTC-Time)
cronTime.tooltipText: Hour of the day, where the cronjob should start (UTC-Time).

cronInterval.label: Cronjob Interval
cronInterval.tooltipText: After how many hours the cronjob should be repeated.

save.title: Save preferences
save.msgErrorCreds: Your credentials could not be verified!

settingForm.messageSaveSuccess: The SiteSearch360 settings have been saved.
settingForm.messageTestError: The credentials could not be validated.
settingForm.messageWebhookError: The webhook could not be saved. The following errors occured:
